original_text: who led you through the great and terrifying wilderness, with its fiery serpents and scorpions and thirsty ground where there was no water, who brought you water out of the flinty rock,
korean_text: 너를 인도하여 그 광대하고 위험한 광야 곧 불뱀과 전갈이 있고 물이 없는 간조한 땅을 지나게 하셨으며 또 너를 위하여 단단한 반석에서 물을 내셨으며

sentences.original_text: who led you through the great and terrifying wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 크고 두려운 광야로 인도하신 분

sentences.original_text: with its fiery serpents and scorpions
and thirsty ground where there was no water
who brought you water out of the flinty rock
sentences.korean_translation: 단단한 반석에서 너에게 물을 주신 분
